name: Notch Studio
tag_list: web, graphic, print, design, programming, branding, advertising, presentations
overview:
We are Notch Studio, an agency that is capable in both online and offline design, as well as website/application development. Our primary business is in designing and developing high quality rich media websites with the latest technology.

Overview of our services:

  • Corporate, E-commerce, Social Media & Interactive websites
  • Web Applications/Systems such as IMS, CDS & CMS
  • Intranet
  • Presentations
  • Websites maintenance
  • Static & Animated Web Banners
  • Electronic Direct Mailers
  • Corporate Identity
  • Offline: Namecards, poster, brochures, banners & booklet
